snippet: In the first known fatality from the illness in North America, a person died in Alberta this month, two days after returning from China, Canada’s health minister said.
abstract: Canada’s health officials say a person in Alberta died of the bird flu virus, first known fatality from the illness in North America
lead_paragraph: In the first known fatality from the illness in North America, a person died in Alberta this month, two days after returning from China, Canada’s health minister said.

headline.main: Bird Flu Cited by Officials in Death in Canada
headline.print_headline: Bird Flu Cited By Officials In a Death in Canada
